State Data Files

Dataset Name Description CSV XLS XML KML
Average Wage Information Average Wage in Utah (May 2008) CSV XLS
Demographic and Economic Projections: 2008 Baseline Projections Summary 2008 Baseline Projections Summary XLS
Demographics Population Estimates: The State of Utah and Counties 1940-2008 Population estimates for the  State of Utah and Counties 1940-2008 XLS
Demographics Projections: Population by Area, Gender and Selected Age Groups Population Projections with Population by Area, Gender and Selected Age Groups XLS
Exploration and Drilling Activity Exploration and Drilling Activity (Oil and Gas) in Utah, 1960-2008 XLS
Firmfind - Other Utah Counties A directory of companies in 28 Utah Counties excluding Salt Lake County CSV
Firmfind - SLC A directory of companies in Salt Lake County CSV
Gallbladder Removals Gall bladder removals (in-patient and out-patient) at Utah Hospitals CSV XLS
Heart Failure Rates at Utah Hospitals Average Hospital Charges for Adults 18 Years and Over, Utah: 2006 CSV XLS
Hip Replacement Deaths in Utah Hospitals Comparison of Death Rates at Utah Hospitals for Hip Replacement Patients CSV XLS
Landslide Database of Utah, 1850-1978 The Preliminary Landslide History Database of Utah, 1850-1978 provides mostly non-technical information on landslide events that occurred from 1850 to 1978. XLS
Master PSAP Registry 2009 List of Public Safety Answering Points (PSAPS) in Utah. These centers respond to 911 calls and provide dispatch services for law enforcement in Utah XLS
MesoWest Surface Weather Surface weather observations from MesoWest (Univ. of Utah) and RTMA images of surface temperature, moisture, wind, and precipitation   KMZ
Newborn Hospital Charges Average Newborn Hospital Charges XLS
Pneumonia Deaths Comparison of Death Rates at Utah Hospitals for Pneumonia Patients CSV XLS
Snake Valley Well Data A new interactive map of Snake Valley with all of the well data. West Desert Ground-Water Monitoring Network is almost complete and updates are available on a newly developed Google Earth™ interactive map KMZ
St. George Geology NE Corner This geologic map allows viewers to see the geology in three dimensions (3-D). We created an overlay of the new geologic map of the St. George 30' x 60' quadrangle (the map is currently in the final stages of review) that can be draped over the landscape on virtual globes such as Google Earth™. KML
St. George Geology NW Corner This geologic map allows viewers to see the geology in three dimensions (3-D). We created an overlay of the new geologic map of the St. George 30' x 60' quadrangle (the map is currently in the final stages of review) that can be draped over the landscape on virtual globes such as Google Earth™. KML
ST. George Geology SE Corner This geologic map allows viewers to see the geology in three dimensions (3-D). We created an overlay of the new geologic map of the St. George 30' x 60' quadrangle (the map is currently in the final stages of review) that can be draped over the landscape on virtual globes such as Google Earth™. KML
St. George Geology SW Corner This geologic map allows viewers to see the geology in three dimensions (3-D). We created an overlay of the new geologic map of the St. George 30' x 60' quadrangle (the map is currently in the final stages of review) that can be draped over the landscape on virtual globes such as Google Earth™. KML
St. George Virtual Field Trip This geologic map allows viewers to see the geology in three dimensions (3-D). We created an overlay of the new geologic map of the St. George 30' x 60' quadrangle (the map is currently in the final stages of review) that can be draped over the landscape on virtual globes such as Google Earth™. KML
State and County Historical Economic Data: Labor Force Labor Force, Employment, Unemployment and Unemployment Rate XLS
State and County Historical Economic Data: Non Agricultural Payroll by SIC Non-Agricultural Payroll Employment by SIC Industry XLS
State and County Historical Economic Data: Non-Agricultural Payroll Employment by NAICS Non-Agricultural Payroll Employment by NAICS Industry XLS
State and County Historical Economic Data: Personal Income and Earnings (BEA CA 30 Data) Personal Income and Earnings (BEA CA 30 Data) XLS
State and County Historical Economic Data: Residential Building Permits
 Residential Building Permits XLS
State and County Historical Economic Data: Total Non-Agricultural Wages and Salaries (NAICS) Total Non-Agricultural Wages and Salaries (NAICS) XLS
State and County Historical Economic Data: Total Non-Agricultural Wages and Salaries (SIC) Total Non-Agricultural Wages and Salaries (SIC) XLS
Utah Core Research Sample Catalog Soil sampling data from across the state of Utah. CSV XLS
Utah GeoSights Explore geological sites in Utah with Google Earth. KML
Utah Refinery Receipts of Crude Oil Utah Refinery Receipts of Crude Oil by State of Origin, 1960-2008 XLS
Utah Wells and Springs The Well and Spring database contains data of 2981 wells, springs, and miscellaneous sites such as collector wells and mines. XLS
Weber County City Boundaries Part of a larger set of spacial data files that can be found at http://www.co.weber.ut.us/wiki/index.php/Category:KMZ KML
Weber County Prime Farmland Part of a larger set of spacial data files that can be found at http://www.co.weber.ut.us/wiki/index.php/Category:KMZ KML
